d:
"Naming this comic Walls because everything else I came up with sounded a bit too much like a sitcom title ğŸ˜…

I added a new intro page, redrew the splash page, redid the color grading and added a new page so this upload wouldn't be a complete retread of the original upload!

Do you guys enjoy the dark mode borders? I figure since so many people suffer from screen-related eye fatigue nowadays, it'd be more considerate to not use too much light in the digital uploads of this work.

I'll probably do a light mode if this work ever picks up enough traction for a print edition ğŸ˜… But I'm making no assumptions about whether people embrace this project or not. Thank you all so much all the same for reading ğŸ™

First impressions are important ğŸ¯"
